data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Galvis, William (2017): Nineteen new species of Amphidraus Simon, 1900 (Salticidae: Euophryini) from Colombia, with comments about their conservation. Zootaxa 4286 (1): 1-40, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4286.1.1|39 occurrences
